title: Humor-based advanced information and digital literacy education program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Constructs an engaging learning environment using humor to help math professionals effectively utilize information analysis and digital solutions

learning_goals: Learners can identify reliable information sources in digital environments with 90% accuracy
Learners can create infographics explaining mathematical concepts using data visualization tools
Learners can critically evaluate information retrieval results and select materials suitable for practical application
Learners can explain complex digital concepts with over 80% comprehension through humor-based learning content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
